subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT ma.`id_product`, p.`quantity` AS product_quantity, pl.`name`, ma.`id_product_attribute` FROM `
product_lang` pl ON (pl.`id_product` = p.`id_product` AND pl.id_shop IN (
attribute` a ON (a.`id_attribute` = pac.`id_attribute`) LEFT JOIN `
attribute_group` ag ON (ag.`id_attribute_group` = a.`id_attribute_group`) LEFT JOIN `
attribute_lang` al ON (a.`id_attribute` = al.`id_attribute` AND al.`id_lang` =
attribute_group_lang` agl ON (ag.`id_attribute_group` = agl.`id_attribute_group` AND agl.`id_lang` =
SELECT id_customer, customer_email, id_shop, id_lang FROM `
